void.string: insert into fnbl_last_sync (principal, sync_source, sync_type, status, last_anchor_server, last_anchor_client, start_sync, end_sync) values(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
update fnbl_last_sync set sync_type=?, status=?, last_anchor_server=?, last_anchor_client=?, start_sync=?, end_sync=? where principal=? and sync_source=?
select sync_type, status, last_anchor_server, last_anchor_client, start_sync,end_sync from fnbl_last_sync where principal=? and sync_source=?
select principal, sync_source, sync_type, status, last_anchor_server, last_anchor_client, start_sync, end_sync from fnbl_last_sync
delete from fnbl_last_sync where principal = ? and sync_source = ?
